org.datavec.dataframe.io.csv

Class CsvCombiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.dataframe.io.csv.CsvCombiner

  • @Immutable
public class CsvCombiner
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility that takes all CSV files in a folder and combines them into a single file. The files should all have the same structure (number and type of columns) and be consistent in having or not having header lines at the beginning
